text:
Quantico to have a second season

Actor Priyanka Chopra’s international TV series Quantico has been renewed for a second season. Priyanka plays Alex Parrish, a rookie FBI recruit with a mysterious past in season one.

Priyanka is also working on a Baywatch film. WWE wrestler-turned-actor Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson has said that he is bowled over with the charm and talent of Bollywood actor Priyanka Chopra. The Quantico star plays villainous Victoria Deeds in the film. Johnson shared an on-set picture with the 33-year-old on Instagram. “Every great story starts with a great villain... My sistah @priyankachopra is one of the biggest and most beloved stars in the world,” he wrote in the caption. “When I asked her how she felt about playing opposite me as our main #BAYWATCH villain she simply said with a sly and seductively evil smile, “Oh you’re going down...”

Priyanka also won applause recently for her healthy appetite. Appearing as a guest on The Tonight Show With Jimmy Fallon , she beat the host in a chicken wings eating contest. — PTI
title: ENT-JOHNSON
